feed.title: Receipt Wrangler Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Receipt Wrangler: v6.0 (Breaking Changes)
entry.content:
Changes

  • Implements Asynq to process receipts in the background
  • Adds activity dashboard widget to see what's happening in the group
  • Redis now requried

Migration guide available here: https://receiptwrangler.io/docs/migration-guide

What's Changed

  • Task/add asynq shell by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/324
  • Feature/quick scan async by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/326
  • Feature/email asynq by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/330
  • Enhancement/add user password support by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/332
  • Feature/add asynq settings to system settings by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/334
  • Feature/add recent activity widget by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/335
  • Enhancements/rc2 fixes by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/337
  • Bugfix/misc fixes by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/341
  • V6.0 by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/342

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/compare/v5.5.0...v6.0

entry.title: New release for Receipt Wrangler: v6.1.0
entry.content:
Highlights

  • Fixed arm builds
  • Updated auth libs to next major version
  • Updated image magick to next major version

What's Changed

  • Bugfix/fix arm builds by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/343
  • uncommited changes by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/346
  • Update set-up-dependencies.sh by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/347
  • Task/update auth libs by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/348

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/compare/v6.0...v6.1.0

entry.title: New release for Receipt Wrangler: v6.2.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • enhnacement/add api key to custom by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/350
  • Bug/fix misc bugs by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/351
  • Feature/export data by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/353
  • Chore/cleanup by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/354
  • fix tests by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/355
  • Feature/export individual receipts by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/356

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/compare/v6.1.0...v6.2.0

entry.title: New release for Receipt Wrangler: v6.3.0
entry.content:
Highlights

  • Custom field implementation
  • Fixed annoying jwt not found error
  • Add vision for gemini

What's Changed

  • bugfix/fix-gemini-404 by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/360
  • implement use vision for gemini by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/362
  • feature/custom fields table by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/364
  • Bump golang.org/x/net from 0.34.0 to 0.36.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/366
  • Feature/custom fields create by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/367
  • Feature/custom field view by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/368
  • feature/custom-field-delete by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/369
  • Bump github.com/golang-jwt/jwt/v5 from 5.2.1 to 5.2.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/371
  • Feature/add custom field to receipt by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/374
  • add boolean type by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/375
  • fix by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/372
  • Delete custom field values when deleting custom fields by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/376
  • Bug/fix duplicate refresh tokens by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/377
  • Feature/custom fields by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/380

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/compare/v6.2.0...v6.3.0

entry.title: New release for Receipt Wrangler: v6.4.0
entry.content:
Highlights

  • Added bulk user delete
  • Added starttls option for email
  • Added the ability to return tokens in body

What's Changed

  • Maintenance/update deps by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/385
  • Feature/add starttls by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/388
  • return tokens in body by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/390
  • Bulk User Delete by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/391
  • update fields by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/392

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/compare/v6.3.0...v6.4.0

What's Changed

  • Maintenance/update deps by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/385
  • Feature/add starttls by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/388
  • return tokens in body by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/390
  • Bulk User Delete by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/391
  • update fields by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/392

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/compare/v6.3.0...v6.4.0
